CS:GO is a fun and engaging game. Weather or not you are playing competitive or casual there is a little something for everyone, not only that there is a big community around trading skins. Final thoughts: CS:GO is a good game with a good community highly recommend CS:GO for anyone that is looking for a good first person shooter.

Jogo bom, um dos melhores que já joguei. Porém, a Valve precisa ser mais ativa e severa no quesito proteção contra Cheaters, há ainda muitos jogadores que fazem a utilização de cheat e isso acaba estragando o jogo.
it makes you want to pull your hair out while simultaneously have fun

After this game became free it just became hell. 1/5 games i play has a cheater and VAC isn't doing anyone a favor. Rn i would love to see a change in the banning system. I have clips of when the enemy is using literal and visible trigger bot and wallhacks  and this really annoys alot of people out. I would like to see an improvement in the future
Valve doesn't care about the game. Besides that, it has a lot of cheaters. Good game but I don't recommend it till it's fixed (and it will never be fixed for sure...).
I think this game copied valorant.
